name: test_e2e_with_logs[145_XSS_BYPASS_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_BYPASS_008` |
| **Name** | Object data URL injection |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<object data='data:text/html,<script>alert(1)</script>'>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cobject%20data%3D'data%3Atext%2Fhtml%2C%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E'%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~62000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:31:08.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_BYPASS_008-1770841868840-e6tr3e pattern_id=XSS_BYPASS_008 uri=/?q=%3Cobject%20data%3D'data%3Atext%2Fhtml%2C%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E'%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
